subject: [cc-community] CCi Affiliate Scholarship Campaign
body: Dear All, I just wanted to inform you of today's launch of the CCi Affiliate Scholarship Campaign <http://creativecommons.org/weblog/entry/7408>. We are trying to raise $50,000 in the next two weeks and need your help. The CCi Affiliates are crucial to the dissemination of and education around CC and the movement towards a global digital commons. It is imperative that a truly global perspective is represented at the iCommons Summit. If you could help spread this information or monetarily support this initiative we would be truly thankful.We unequivocally appreciate you, our community, and are confident that you will help us overcome this daunting task. If you have any other questions or know of a company that would like to contribute matching funds to help us more quickly reach this goal please let me know.Best,MelissaDevelopment CoordinatorCreative Commons
